Miscellaneous Highlights: Wet outfield in Florida led to the washout of India's final Group A game vs Canada.
India ended their group stage campaign unbeaten with 7 points from 4 matches.
3 of the 4 matches scheduled in Florida have been washed out due to wet outfield.
India were robbed of an opportunity to experiment with their team combination.
India players and coaching staff signed autographs for fans during the delay.
Others: Poor drainage and lack of covers at the Central Broward Regional Park Stadium in Florida has not led to good viewing.
Flash flood alerts were issued in Florida due to heavy rain over the last week.
